item.title: By: Dave Morrison
item.dc:creator: Dave Morrison
item.description: It's worth noting, there's a nasty little bug in the rotate 270 which means on certain render formats it simply wont drawn the text that way round and will just revert to horizontal, making the report look awful
item.content:encoded: It’s worth noting, there’s a nasty little bug in the rotate 270 which means on certain render formats it simply wont drawn the text that way round and will just revert to horizontal, making the report look awful
